channel.title: Helios - 317 -Spawn/PK
channel.description:
[b][u][size=24pt]HELIOS - 317[/size][/u][/b]
Helios is a new server, made to be driven by the community. We listen to what player's request to be added to the server, and do the best possible to have it added for them the way they invision it. On our forums, we as a staff team are dedicated to listening to what the player has to say, and using that knowledge to benefit the server even more. As the features of Helios are endless, here are a few of our more noticeable features:
*Perfect combat *Perfect item switching *Bank Searching *ALLskills work 100% *Spawn/PK, with an economy *Full Screen Gameplay *Custom Player Info Tab *2 Custom PK tabs for your PKing needs. *Custom Monster+Skilling teleport interfaces *Change completionist cape colors *Custom completionist cape emote *100% Fully Functional Tutorial Island *Many Shops to spend your PK Points! *Drygores! (offhands as well, this alongside the Moon Blade are the only customs) *Perfect emote enhancer items *IPB Forums Page *XP Counter *Chaotics *PvP Artifact exchanging *Fast Loading *Many Bosses and PK zones to explore and conquer *Dicing *Killstreak System with rewards! *Loads more!
So what are you waiting for? Come and join Helios and start your adventure today!
[img]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t639/ItsBing/Thieving2_zpsbc9c4382.png[/img] [img]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t639/ItsBing/Hunter_zpsf9c3b2ca.png[/img] [img]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t639/ItsBing/PKShop2_zpse0efdfd2.png[/img] [img]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t639/ItsBing/PKShop1_zps06c2392a.png[/img] [img]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t639/ItsBing/DonorShop2_zps60242cb3.png[/img] [img]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t639/ItsBing/DonorShop1_zpsd757bb75.png[/img] [img]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t639/ItsBing/Woodcutting_zps1b13b365.png[/img] [img]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t639/ItsBing/Forums_zpsfd9fd19b.png[/img] [img]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t639/ItsBing/Tabs_zps39ae4040.png[/img]
[img]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t639/ItsBing/FullScreen_zps717a853e.png[/img]
Come join us at Helios!
Website: http://Heliosrsps.Co.Nr
Forums: http://heliosrsps.co.nr/forums
Webclient: http://heliosrsps.co.nr/forums/index.php/pages/webclient
DL Client: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/244867873/Helios.jar

item.title: Helios - 317 -Spawn/PK
item.dc:creator: @HeliosRSPS HeliosRSPS
item.description:
@HeliosRSPS wrote:

                            [b][u][size=24pt]HELIOS - 317[/size][/u][/b]

Helios is a new server, made to be driven by the community. We listen to what player’s request to be added to the server, and do the best possible to have it added for them the way they invision it. On our forums, we as a staff team are dedicated to listening to what the player has to say, and using that knowledge to benefit the server even more.
As the features of Helios are endless, here are a few of our more noticeable features:

*Perfect combat
*Perfect item switching
*Bank Searching
*ALLskills work 100%
*Spawn/PK, with an economy
*Full Screen Gameplay
*Custom Player Info Tab
*2 Custom PK tabs for your PKing needs.
*Custom Monster+Skilling teleport interfaces
*Change completionist cape colors
*Custom completionist cape emote
*100% Fully Functional Tutorial Island
*Many Shops to spend your PK Points!
*Drygores! (offhands as well, this alongside the Moon Blade are the only customs)
*Perfect emote enhancer items
*IPB Forums Page
*XP Counter
*Chaotics
*PvP Artifact exchanging
*Fast Loading
*Many Bosses and PK zones to explore and conquer
*Dicing
*Killstreak System with rewards!
*Loads more!

So what are you waiting for? Come and join Helios and start your adventure today!









Come join us at Helios!
